flowRoot.flowPara: My python knowledge is strong and I can learn new technologies with speed and ease. My professional programming experience spans nearly eight years in Linux and Unix-like environments. I have experience working as an individual, part of a team, and mentoring junior developers. My time spent in tech support demonstrates that I can listen to and communicate with all types of people.
I work in a team of more than twenty-five developers to build the worlds largest Django CMS.
Software Engineer, IDEAL Technology, Orlando, FL

flowPara.flowSpan: I have been involved with all stages of development of I.D.E.A.L's current product STRIKE™ a digital media exploitation tool. I was part of the four man team that designed and built this system which was delivered in six months. My influence has brought functional specifications to our development cycle. I have leveraged open source libraries to create custom filesystem drivers in userspace. My pyGTK code allows users to customize the way STRIKE extracts and analyzes data as well as view that data intuitvly. It was my idea to use the window manager Fluxbox to enable our system to operate like a

kiosk. I designed and wrote a process that we use to provide in-field updates to our customers. In this position I also mentored junior developers by giving talks, reviewing their code, providing constructive feedback, and sizing tasks apropriately.

flowRoot.flowPara: Programmer, International Aviation Advisors, Orlando, FL 4/2003 – 12/2004
My responsibility was to maintain and modify an online value forecast simulation written in c and Perl. My duties included code verification, web application development, and scripting tests.
Jr. Systems Administrator, Quasar.net, Orlando, FL 1/2002 – 2/2003
I Managed and maintained Linux web servers. One notable project during this time was my development of a custom server applications in Perl to facilitate bandwidth reporting.
Customer Specialist, Convergys, Lake Mary, FL 4/2000 – 10/2000
My job was to provide consumer and business technical support for Gateway brand computers over the phone. This includes both pc hardware and MS Windows software.
